ai-ja221:1.1_0: One who, not free of stains themselves,
ai-ja221:1.2_0: would wear the robe stained in ocher,
ai-ja221:1.3_0: bereft of self-control and of truth:
ai-ja221:1.4_0: But it’s not appropriate for you to deserve to be made.
ai-ja221:2.1_0: One who rains on every year,
ai-ja221:2.4_0: That one deserves to be promise.”
ai-ja221:3.1_0: First, when the ocher robe is finished.
